title: Uses
description: A full-stack PHP developer with a love for Laravel, Vue, and Docker.

items.name: MacBook Air M1
items.description: My go-to for any work done not at my office desk or when travelling. I went with the 8gb version and it's been plenty, even using Docker.

items.name: Mac Mini M1
items.description: The machine that I do the bulk of my work on. It's the cheapest version and has been plenty powerful enough to do both programming and recording tasks on it.

items.name: Custom Built PC
items.description: Mostly for video games, but occasionally for streaming and editing heavier videos. Specs include Ryzen 5 3600, Radeon RX 580, and 16GB of RAM.

items.name: Samsung UR55 Monitor
items.description: A larger 4K 28-inch IPS monitor from Samsung. I also have a smaller 24-inch one in a vertical position on the left side.

items.name: Realspace Magellan 60 Inch Standing Desk
items.description: After I started working fully from home, I really wanted a standing desk that was easy to move up and down but didn't break the bank.

items.name: MP Select Mini V2
items.description: In my free time, I work on small electronics projects (like Arduino weather monitors). This Monoprice printer is a great entry-level machine.

items.name: Rode Procaster
items.description: Microphone for streaming and video recording. After using a Blue Snowball iCE for years, I switched to this dynamic microphone for better noise cancellation.

items.name: Mechanical Keyboard
items.description: A custom-built mechanical keyboard, using the GK64 platform. Currently has Kailh Box Jade switches and some thick PBT keycaps.

items.name: AirPods
items.description: I've gone through a lot of headphones throughout the years, but I absolutely love the mix of portability and decent sound quality these provide.

items.name: PHPStorm
items.description: Hands-down my favorite IDE, especially with frameworks like Laravel. I've tried other solutions but always end up coming back to this.

items.name: Material Theme UI
items.description: The theme that I've been using for years with PHPStorm. I have it set to the Atom One Dark color scheme and use the Fira Code font with ligatures.

items.name: OBS
items.description: The application I use to stream web development, and what I used to record my screen with. The settings I use are mostly standard, set to 60 FPS.

items.name: Audio Hijack
items.description: Audio for video tutorials is recorded and edited in real-time with this program. Mostly a noise gate and some boost to the low-end for a deeper sound.

items.name: ScreenFlow
items.description: What I use to record and edit all of my tutorial videos and courses. It's MacOS only, but incredibly optimized for that platform.

items.name: iTerm
items.description: An incredibly feature-rich terminal replacement for MacOS. I use it in conjunction with oh-my-zsh and a modified Robby Russell theme.

items.name: Table Plus
items.description: A great database GUI app for MacOS. It has the unique feature of waiting to commit modifications until you press Cmd + S.
